mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, S.W. Tiffey to Nancy Halsted, 1869 May 7
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Tiffey, S. W.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Letter from S.W. Tiffey, secretary, to Nancy Halsted, Vice Regent for New Jersey, May 7, 1869. Mount Vernon. Complimentary ticket sent to Professor Joseph Henry. Mrs. Berghmann's report on Hiram Power's statue of E. Everett designed for MVLA. Cost of painting Banquet Hall. Slow returns on New Jersey Appeal. Information on sale on Washington property adjoining Mount Vernon. Mansion repair costs prevent painting.
